# cake

## Overview 

`cake` aims to provide simple functions to get Swiss Open Government Data from
different sources.

## Installation

The packages is not listed on CRAN at the moment.
The easiest way to install it is to use the `install_github` function from
the `devtools` package:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("datenbaecker/cake")
```

## Cheat Sheet

Take a look at the [cheat sheet](./cheatsheet.pdf) to get started.

## Getting Help

If you encounter a bug, please file an issue with a minimal reproducible example on 
[GitHub](https://github.com/datenbaecker/cake/issues).
